28 #include <dcmtk/config/osconfig.h> /* make sure OS specific configuration is included first */
29

37 #include <dcmtk/dcmdata/dcistrmz.h> /* for dcmZlibExpectRFC1950Encoding */
38 // For dcm images
39 #include <dcmtk/dcmimgle/dcmimage.h>

66 class QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidgetPrivate
67 {
68 public:
69  QtDcmPreferences * preferences;
70 };
71 
72 QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget ( QWidget* parent ) : QWidget ( parent ), d ( new QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidgetPrivate )
73 {
74  this->setupUi ( this );
75 
76  d->preferences = NULL;
77 
78  treeWidget->setColumnWidth ( 1, 100 );
79  treeWidget->setColumnWidth ( 2, 100 );
80  treeWidget->setColumnWidth ( 3, 150 );
81 
82  serverNameEdit->setEnabled ( false );
83  serverAetitleEdit->setEnabled ( false );
84  serverPortEdit->setEnabled ( false );
85  serverHostnameEdit->setEnabled ( false );
86  removeButton->setEnabled ( false );
87  echoButton->setEnabled ( false );
88 
89 
90  this->initConnections();
91 }
92 
93 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::initConnections()
94 {
95  QObject::connect ( treeWidget, SIGNAL ( currentItemChanged ( QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem* ) ), this, SLOT ( itemSelected ( QTreeWidgetItem*, QTreeWidgetItem* ) ) );
96  QObject::connect ( serverNameEdit, SIGNAL ( textChanged ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( serverNameChanged ( QString ) ) );
97  QObject::connect ( serverHostnameEdit, SIGNAL ( textChanged ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( serverHostnameChanged ( QString ) ) );
98  QObject::connect ( serverAetitleEdit, SIGNAL ( textChanged ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( serverAetitleChanged ( QString ) ) );
99  QObject::connect ( serverPortEdit, SIGNAL ( textChanged ( QString ) ), this, SLOT ( serverPortChanged ( QString ) ) );
100  QObject::connect ( addButton, SIGNAL ( clicked() ), this, SLOT ( addServer() ) );
101  QObject::connect ( removeButton, SIGNAL ( clicked() ), this, SLOT ( removeServer() ) );
102  QObject::connect ( echoButton, SIGNAL ( clicked() ), this, SLOT ( sendEcho() ) );
103 }
104 
105 QtDcmPreferences* QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::getPreferences()
106 {
107  return d->preferences;
108 }
109 
110 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::setPreferences ( QtDcmPreferences* prefs )
111 {
112  d->preferences = prefs;
113 
114  for ( int i = 0; i < d->preferences->getServers().size(); i++ )
115  {
116  QTreeWidgetItem * item = new QTreeWidgetItem ( treeWidget );
117  item->setText ( 0, d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->getName() );
118  item->setData ( 0, 1, QVariant ( d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->getName() ) );
119  item->setData ( 4, 1, QVariant ( i ) );
120  item->setText ( 1, d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->getAetitle() );
121  item->setData ( 1, 1, QVariant ( d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->getAetitle() ) );
122  item->setText ( 2, d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->getPort() );
123  item->setData ( 2, 1, QVariant ( d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->getPort() ) );
124  item->setText ( 3, d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->getHostname() );
125  item->setData ( 3, 1, QVariant ( d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->getHostname() ) );
126  }
127 }
128 
129 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::updatePreferences()
130 {
131  if ( d->preferences )
132  {
133  QTreeWidgetItem * root = treeWidget->invisibleRootItem();
134 
135  for ( int i = 0; i < d->preferences->getServers().size(); i++ )
136  {
137  d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->setName ( root->child ( i )->data ( 0, 1 ).toString() );
138  d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->setAetitle ( root->child ( i )->data ( 1, 1 ).toString() );
139  d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->setPort ( root->child ( i )->data ( 2, 1 ).toString() );
140  d->preferences->getServers().at ( i )->setHostname ( root->child ( i )->data ( 3, 1 ).toString() );
141  }
142 
143  d->preferences->writeSettings();
144  }
145 }
146 
147 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::addServer()
148 {
149  QTreeWidgetItem * item = new QTreeWidgetItem ( treeWidget );
150  d->preferences->addServer();
151  item->setText ( 0, "Name" );
152  item->setData ( 0, 1, QVariant ( "Name" ) );
153  d->preferences->getServers().last()->setName ( "Name" );
154  item->setText ( 1, "AETITLE" );
155  item->setData ( 1, 1, QVariant ( "AETITLE" ) );
156  d->preferences->getServers().last()->setAetitle ( "AETITLE" );
157  item->setText ( 2, "2010" );
158  d->preferences->getServers().last()->setPort ( "2010" );
159  item->setData ( 2, 1, QVariant ( 2010 ) );
160  item->setText ( 3, "hostname" );
161  item->setData ( 3, 1, QVariant ( "hostname" ) );
162  item->setData ( 4, 1, QVariant ( d->preferences->getServers().size() - 1 ) );
163  d->preferences->getServers().last()->setHostname ( "hostname" );
164 }
165 
166 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::removeServer()
167 {
168  QTreeWidgetItem * root = treeWidget->invisibleRootItem();
169  d->preferences->removeServer ( root->indexOfChild ( treeWidget->currentItem() ) );
170 
171  if ( root->childCount() == 0 )
172  {
173  echoButton->setEnabled ( false );
174  removeButton->setEnabled ( false );
175  }
176  else if ( root->childCount() == 1 )
177  {
178  treeWidget->reset();
179  treeWidget->clear();
180  removeButton->setEnabled ( false );
181  echoButton->setEnabled ( false );
182  }
183  else
184  root->removeChild ( treeWidget->currentItem() );
185 }
186 
187 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::itemSelected ( QTreeWidgetItem* current, QTreeWidgetItem* previous )
188 {
189  echoButton->setEnabled ( true );
190  removeButton->setEnabled ( true );
191  serverNameEdit->setEnabled ( true );
192  serverAetitleEdit->setEnabled ( true );
193  serverPortEdit->setEnabled ( true );
194  serverHostnameEdit->setEnabled ( true );
195  serverNameEdit->setText ( current->data ( 0, 1 ).toString() );
196  serverAetitleEdit->setText ( current->data ( 1, 1 ).toString() );
197  serverPortEdit->setText ( current->data ( 2, 1 ).toString() );
198  serverHostnameEdit->setText ( current->data ( 3, 1 ).toString() );
199 }
200 
201 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::serverAetitleChanged ( QString text )
202 {
203  QRegExp rexp ( "[A-Z0-9._-]{1,50}" );
204  QRegExpValidator * valid = new QRegExpValidator ( rexp, this );
205  serverAetitleEdit->setValidator ( valid );
206  treeWidget->currentItem()->setText ( 1, text );
207  treeWidget->currentItem()->setData ( 1, 1, QVariant ( text ) );
208 }
209 
210 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::serverHostnameChanged ( QString text )
211 {
212  treeWidget->currentItem()->setText ( 3, text );
213  treeWidget->currentItem()->setData ( 3, 1, QVariant ( text ) );
214 }
215 
216 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::serverNameChanged ( QString text )
217 {
218  treeWidget->currentItem()->setText ( 0, text );
219  treeWidget->currentItem()->setData ( 0, 1, QVariant ( text ) );
220 }
221 
222 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::serverPortChanged ( QString text )
223 {
224  QIntValidator * valid = new QIntValidator ( 1000, 100000, this );
225  serverPortEdit->setValidator ( valid );
226  treeWidget->currentItem()->setText ( 2, text );
227  treeWidget->currentItem()->setData ( 2, 1, QVariant ( text ) );
228 }
229 
230 void QtDcmServersDicomSettingsWidget::sendEcho()
231 {
232  if ( !d->preferences )
233  return;
234 
235  if ( !treeWidget->currentItem() )
236  return;
237 
238  QString aet = d->preferences->getAetitle();
239  QString serverAet = treeWidget->currentItem()->data ( 1, 1 ).toString();
240  QString hostname = d->preferences->getHostname();
241  QString serverHostname = treeWidget->currentItem()->data ( 3, 1 ).toString();
242  QString serverPort = treeWidget->currentItem()->data ( 2, 1 ).toString();
243 
244  T_ASC_Network *net; // network struct, contains DICOM upper layer FSM etc.
245 
246  OFCondition cond = ASC_initializeNetwork ( NET_REQUESTOR, 0, 30 /* timeout */, &net );
247  if ( cond != EC_Normal )
248  {
249  QMessageBox * msgBox = new QMessageBox ( QApplication::activeWindow() );
250  msgBox->setIcon ( QMessageBox::Critical );
251  msgBox->setText ( "Cannot initialize network" );
252  msgBox->exec();
253  delete msgBox;
254  return;
255  }
256 
257  QTcpSocket * socket = new QTcpSocket;
258  socket->connectToHost(serverHostname, serverPort.toInt());
259  if (socket->waitForConnected(1000))
260  socket->disconnectFromHost();
261  else
262  {
263  QMessageBox * msgBox = new QMessageBox ( QApplication::activeWindow() );
264  msgBox->setIcon ( QMessageBox::Information );
265  msgBox->setText ( "Cannot connect to server " + serverHostname + " on port " + serverPort + " !" );
266  msgBox->exec();
267  delete msgBox;
268  return;
269  }
270 
271  T_ASC_Parameters *params; // parameters of association request
272 
273  cond = ASC_createAssociationParameters ( &params, ASC_DEFAULTMAXPDU );
274 
275  // set calling and called AE titles
276  cond = ASC_setAPTitles ( params, aet.toUtf8().data(), serverAet.toUtf8().data(), NULL );
277 
278  // the DICOM server accepts connections at server.nowhere.com port 104
279  cond = ASC_setPresentationAddresses ( params, hostname.toUtf8().data(), QString ( serverHostname + ":" + serverPort ).toAscii().data() );
280 
281  // list of transfer syntaxes, only a single entry here
282  const char* ts[] = { UID_LittleEndianImplicitTransferSyntax };
283 
284  // add presentation context to association request
285  cond = ASC_addPresentationContext ( params, 1, UID_VerificationSOPClass, ts, 1 );
286 
287  // request DICOM association
288  T_ASC_Association *assoc;
289 
290  if ( ASC_requestAssociation ( net, params, &assoc ).good() )
291  {
292  if ( ASC_countAcceptedPresentationContexts ( params ) == 1 )
293  {
294  // the remote SCP has accepted the Verification Service Class
295  DIC_US id = assoc->nextMsgID++; // generate next message ID
296  DIC_US status; // DIMSE status of C-ECHO-RSP will be stored here
297  DcmDataset *sd = NULL; // status detail will be stored here
298  // send C-ECHO-RQ and handle response
299  DIMSE_echoUser ( assoc, id, DIMSE_BLOCKING, 0, &status, &sd );
300 
301  delete sd; // we don't care about status detail
302  QMessageBox * msgBox = new QMessageBox ( QApplication::activeWindow() );
303  msgBox->setIcon ( QMessageBox::Information );
304  msgBox->setText ( "Echo request successful !" );
305  msgBox->exec();
306  delete msgBox;
307  }
308  else
309  {
310  QMessageBox * msgBox = new QMessageBox ( QApplication::activeWindow() );
311  msgBox->setIcon ( QMessageBox::Critical );
312  msgBox->setText ( "Wrong presentation context, echo request failed" );
313  msgBox->exec();
314  delete msgBox;
315  }
316  }
317  else
318  {
319  QMessageBox * msgBox = new QMessageBox ( QApplication::activeWindow() );
320  msgBox->setIcon ( QMessageBox::Critical );
321  msgBox->setText ( "Wrong dicom association, echo request failed" );
322  msgBox->exec();
323  delete msgBox;
324  }
325 
326  ASC_releaseAssociation ( assoc ); // release association
327  ASC_destroyAssociation ( &assoc ); // delete assoc structure
328  ASC_dropNetwork ( &net ); // delete net structure
329 }
Copyright University of Rennes I, 2011
